text:
Isabel Silva fulfills another dream: â€œI was guided by my heartâ€
04 Nov 2019, 22:50 by Ana Pereira

Confessed lover of sports and marathons, TVI host Isabel Silva set off on her adventure to participate in the New York Marathon.

Now, after running more than 42 kilometers, Isabel Silva shared the moment in which she managed to win her marathon medal.
In the photo caption, Isabel Silva revealed that she made the marathon at 3:21 am â€. â€œI have a crazy watch that decided to catch me in the corner during my Marathon. He says I covered 48.59 km in 3 hours and 21 minutes at a pace of 4:09 min / km. I left him. And I guided myself through my heart. Thinking about this Big Apple.
